articles.description: Max Verstappen was in a league of his own in a Chinese Grand Prix punctuated by two mid-race safety cars.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen wins with Lando Norris second

articles.title: London Marathon 2024 results: Peres Jepchirchir breaks women's only world record

articles.description: Coventry City boss Mark Robins says Manchester United are favourites in the their FA Cup semi-final but he wants his side to "play a part in the game in as positive way as we possibly can".
articles.title: Man Utd favourites by a million miles - Robins

articles.description: American Ryan Garcia floored Devin Haney three times in a majority points win over his compatriot on a dramatic night in Brooklyn, New Yor
articles.title: Ryan Garcia floors Devin Haney three times in dramatic points win

articles.description: The Denver Nuggets, the Minnesota Timberwolves, the New York Knicks and the Cleveland Cavaliers record wins on day one of the 2024 NBA play-offs.
articles.title: NBA play-offs 2024: Denver Nuggets open title defence with win over Los Angeles Lakers

articles.description: Switzerland's Marcel Hug surges to victory in the men's wheelchair race at the London Marathon for the fourth year in a row.
articles.title: London Marathon 2024 results: Marcel Hug wins men's wheelchair race for fourth year in a row
